data.message: Don't know what you did to alter Facebook recently, but I really hate the new changes..

replies.message: We’re sorry to hear that, Bernie. We’re working hard to ensure that our updates improve everyone’s Facebook experience. Let us know what would make your experience more enjoyable at our feedback page: http://on.fb.me/1MtoBEe. Hope you have a great day! -Lauren
Me too ! I HATE the game ads popping up on my news feed !!
why do u keep changing my news feed preference from top stories instead of most recent? leave my settings alone. I don't want top stories I want most recent to be my preference.
